column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ada - Thanks for your review. I'm glad you enjoyed our fare. But
column3: thank you for pointing out the white quartz featured in the community tables. For starters
column4: we clean the white rocks every two weeks
column5: but in these past two weeks we experienced a surge in traffic at JINYA-Midtown
column6: especially among large parties of 6 or more guests.
